channel.title: Freelance on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Freelance on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer

item.title: Digital Nomad in Your Own Country
item.description: More than a quarter has passed and so much has happened. However, against all plans and expectations, I haven’t left the country yet. Instead, I decided to start my digital nomad lifestyle in my own country, because well, why not?
